contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2007, the Joint Application is hereby DISMISSED AS MOOT. See Opinion and Order at Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Dep’t of Education v. Chester-Upland Special Board of Control et al., 2007 WL 4538427, 42 MAP 2007, 595 Pa. 426, 938 A.2d 1000 (2007).
